Action.author: mastersingh24
Action.body: *No limit to wrong password try Above conditions result in brute force to CA server admin account* is an issue. I don't see the others as being serious issues. The maxenrollments = -1 issue is mitigated / ameliorated if we fix the wrong password issue

Action.author: dhuseby
Action.body: I just got asked by somebody named "skarim" about getting access to this bug. I just wanted to check with all of you that I should add them before I do.

Action.author: dhuseby
Action.body: So this is a valid issue. What severity so that I can get back to the bug reporter? I'm thinking that the severity is high since it is a bug in the default configuration (see last item under "high" here: https://hackerone.com/hyperledger|https://hackerone.com/hyperledger )

Action.author: skarim
Action.body: ~dhuseby Yes, this is a valid issue and I think a high severity is appropriate.

Action.author: dhuseby
Action.body: Thanks for the feedback. I have set severity to high in the H1 tool and set the reward accordingly.
